main.Query:
declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + ']
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[tblUploadedFiles]'') AND type in (N''U'')) DROP TABLE [dbo].[tblUploadedFiles]
SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[tblUploadedFiles]( [UploadID] [bigint] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [FileName] [nvarchar](200) NULL, [InternalFileName] [nvarchar](200) NULL, [Description] [nvarchar](500) NULL, [UploadTime] [datetime] NULL, [ProcessedTime] [datetime] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_UploadedFiles] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [UploadID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]'
exec (@vchSQL)
